name: places/ChIJ2_-_G6pZwokRvVFNfnBcGt0
formattedAddress: 357 W 36th St. 4th floor, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 357 W 36th St. 4th floor, New York, NY 10001, USA

editorialSummary.text: Established retailer with a wide array of beads, plus jewelry-making supplies, buttons & trimmings.

originalText.text:
The products here are top notch, no doubt about it. But this review is for their customer service.
I can't say enough about how personal, how prompt, how thorough they are in addressing any issues with ordering or delivery or billing. A man named Scott handled all of my concerns and I never once felt like I was being an inconvenience. I'm unfamiliar with a lot of the types, shapes, and sizes of crystals and they fixed everything when I ordered the wrong ones. This is THE company to buy from. Their reputation is well earned!

originalText.text: This place is definitely the BEST place to go for trims and crystals. Everything is incredible quality and the prices are the best in NYC. I’ve been buying crystals for a very long time for costume making and I am so happy I found this place! The people who work here are very nice and helpful when you call. I highly recommend them for all of your crystal needs. Can’t wait to come back!

I highly recommend them for all of your crystal needs. Can’t wait to come back!

originalText.text: I came all the way from the Bronx on  a Tuesday at 1pm just to turn around and leave. It’s not a store. I couldn’t see the items in person. when I called the number, I was told I can shop online. I wouldn’t recommend coming here, it was a waste of my time and gas money.

text.text: I came all the way from the Bronx on  a Tuesday at 1pm just to turn around and leave. It’s not a store. I couldn’t see the items in person. when I called the number, I was told I can shop online. I wouldn’t recommend coming here, it was a waste of my time and gas money.

originalText.text: This is by far the absolute best place to buy rhinestones and trim. The inventory offered is so broad spectrum..from high end 17 faucet chatons, mined in Czechoslovakia, to acrylic stones. Also the stone sizes offered are extremely broad. There is a plethora of color choices to choose from also. Quality, incredible. I have been in business using stones and trim for over 35 years and I must say oh, I am a loyal repetitive customer that highly recommends to look at this company first for any stone or trim purchase. You will not be disappointed with the quality, customer service, as well as the broad range of choices offered. I live in South Florida so I do my shopping online with them. I have been a customer since the Millennia and do not even consider going anywhere else at this point. If you look to Amazon or Ebay, I hate to say you are spending a lot of money for a lot less quality and quantity. This place is so far above the bar it can't be touched! Ask for Sean in customer service and your order will be right every time, LOL. Highly recommend both merchandise and vendor. Next to real diamonds, you will not believe the quality. Also the prices are amazing for the quality of the merchandise.
